params.amounts: Wei amounts to credit per player.

creditDecJackpotClaim(address,uint256).notice: Credit a decimator jackpot claim into the game's claimable balance.

creditDecJackpotClaimBatch(address[],uin.notice: Batch variant to credit decimator jackpot claims.

levelExterminator(uint24).notice: Return the exterminator address for a given level (level index is 1-based).

sampleTraitTickets(uint256).notice: Sample up to 4 trait burn tickets from a random trait and recent level (last 20).
